item.title: Can somebody help me with a little html code Solved
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:455927”]Well, why is your php divided like that? It wouldn’t be so hard to have the php above the html, that’s what I’ve always done.
Second, what up with this:

Uh if I’m not mistaken, that theoretically removes the closing tag. Making it go on till the next closing a tag.[/quote]

Only in Internet Explorer 6 it will remove the closing anchor tag, any other browsers it won’t. I don’t understand why they done that, but there’s obviously a reason. IE never behaves anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somebody help me with a little html code Solved

@TastyTrojans wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:455927”]This isn’t HTML, this is HTML inside a .php file.

So are you trying to add a button background to it or just generally make it work?[/quote] yes it is my bad but yes im just generally trying to get the button to work like when i click the play now button i want it to redirect me to a webclient and i have the address/location to were i want it to redirect me i just need the code that does that if you want a better example go to exalted-scape.net76.net there is a play now button near the top i want to make it so when you click it redirects you to a page

item.title: Can somebody help me with a little html code Solved
item.dc:creator: @TastyTrojans TastyTrojans
item.description:
@TastyTrojans wrote:

ok hey guys my website coder thing just left me hanging here and i made a webclient he coded some of the lin or w.e here is what he did the google . info connects to the Others menu and i want to make the others menu open another site such as my paypal donation page

[code]<?php
session_start();
?>

  • Home
  • Forum Home
  • Others
      <?php $links_db = mysql_query("SELECT * FROM ".$prefix."links ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 6"); if(mysql_num_rows($links_db) > 0) { while($links = mysql_fetch_array($links_db)) { echo '
    • '. htmlspecialchars($links["name"]) .'
      • '; } } else { echo '
    • ';[/code]

      i want to make that button into a button were when you click it it brings you to a webpage if anybody wants/needs to help me over teamviewer or skype that would ba amazing or just comment the html code for what i want nd ill figure it out thank you

      i figured it out the code i used in the end was <li class="top"><a href="http://instructables.com" id="Others" class="tl"><span class="ts">Others</span></a></li> it was basically common sense when i figured out a code to make a word open a page this is a big achievement as this is my first thing ive learned to do
